question: [File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/randomness_event.rs] [Static: RANDOMNESS_GENERATED_EVENT_MOVE_TYPE_TAG] [Race condition] Can concurrent access to the Lazy<TypeTag> during first initialization from multiple threads cause race conditions or double-initialization, potentially leading to inconsistent type tag values across different parts of the system?
